sentences.sContent: He made occasional visits to London.
They had an occasional coffee together after shopping.
sentences.sCn: 他们偶尔会在购物后一起喝杯咖啡。

sentences.sContent: He only has occasional use of a car.
sentences.sCn: 他只是偶尔用一下汽车。

sentences.sContent: We should have enough money for the occasional trip.
sentences.sCn: 我们的钱应该足够偶尔出去旅行一次的。

sentences.sContent: ...Cooking is an occasional hobby and a vehicle for celebrity chefs...
...And while you may forgive your smartphone an occasional fault...
...The benefits of broadband to the occasional home worker are that they can access email in real time...

synos.tran: [生物]偶然的；临时的；特殊场合的

trans.tranCn: 偶尔的， 间或发生的
trans.tranOther: happening sometimes but not often or regularly
